snippet: The Obama administration said that the six-year string of declining annual deficits came to an end with the fiscal year 2016....
abstract: Obama administration reports budget shortfall for fiscal year ended Sept 30 was $587 billion, confirming end of six-year decline in annual budget deficits.
lead_paragraph: The Obama administration said that the six-year string of declining annual deficits came to an end with the fiscal year 2016.

headline.main: U.S. Deficit Increases to $587 Billion, Ending Downward Trend
headline.print_headline: Ending Trend, U.S. Deficit Increases to $587 Billion
